text: Horizontal swiping between cards now works!
OK, I've got all the view things up to date and working as much as possible given the Android framework
I discovered that we can't link directly to a book in the Google Play store, as there are only 3 supported queries for the Play app

attachments.text: Learn how to build links that take users to your published apps in Google Play from browse or search.
attachments.fallback: Learn how to build links that take users to your published apps in Google Play from browse or search.

text: Only app queries, which isn't terrifically useful
Currently, the "action items" are shown for every image, and they link to a search for Haruki Murakami Wind Up Bird Chronicles
So the release notes are: implemented horizontal swiping between detail views (slide 6 full functionality) with the above caveat
I'm heading out for today, but either tomorrow or Mon would be a good time to get together and determine the next steps after they've tested the builds for a bit
